unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Find the Missing Value
question_text: Given this distribution for the random variable $m$, find the missing value.
tables:

Solution

The sum of the probabilities for the distribution of a random variable is always equal to 1
. Therefore, in this problem, you must add up the 4
given probabilities and then subtract that sum from 1
